grids.browse_grid: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 xl:grid-cols-5 gap-4
grids.hero_section: relative h-[70vh] md:h-[85vh] w-full flex items-end pb-20

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide transition-transform hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-md text-white hover:bg-white/30 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-semibold transition-colors

cards.anime_card: relative group aspect-[2/3] overflow-hidden rounded-md bg-card transition-all duration-300 hover:z-50 hover:scale-110 hover:shadow-2xl hover:ring-2 hover:ring-primary/50 cursor-pointer
cards.episode_card: flex flex-col gap-2 group cursor-pointer hover:bg-white/5 p-2 rounded-md transition-colors

navigation.navbar: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-gradient-to-b from-black/80 to-transparent backdrop-blur-sm transition-all duration-300

shadcn_mapping.carousel: Use for 'Trending Now', 'Top 10', and 'Continue Watching' rows.
shadcn_mapping.dialog: Use for 'Quick View' modal when clicking a card.
shadcn_mapping.hover_card: Use for instant details on hover (synopsis, rating).
shadcn_mapping.skeleton: Use for loading states of card grids.
shadcn_mapping.progress: Use for 'Continue Watching' bars on cards.

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Only: Force dark mode classes. Do not support light mode.
Netflix Red (#E50914) is the ONLY primary accent. Use sparingly for CTAs.
Cards must expand on hover. This is the signature Netflix interaction.
Use 'Outfit' font for headings to give a modern, geometric feel.
All interactive elements must have `data-testid` attributes.
Use `lucide-react` for icons (Play, Info, Plus, Search, Bell).
Ensure video player controls overlay is accessible and fades out when inactive.
